tool.name: ExtractHeteroatoms
tool.description: : Class to extract hetero-atoms from a 3D structure using Biopython.

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: heteroatoms
param.label: heteroatoms
param.help: List of dictionaries with the name | res_id | chain | model of the heteroatoms to be extracted. Format: [{"name": "ZZ7", "res_id": "302", "chain": "B", "model": "1"}]. If empty, all the heteroatoms of the structure will be returned. (Json)
